com.gordonwong.materialsheetfab.animations

Class FabAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gordonwong.materialsheetfab.animations.FabAnimation

  • public class FabAnimation
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Gordon Wong on 7/9/2015. Animates the FAB when showing and hiding the material sheet.

    • Field Summary

      protected android.view.View fab

    • Method Detail

      • morphIntoSheet

        public void morphIntoSheet(int endX,
                           int endY,
                           Side side,
                           int arcDegrees,
                           float scaleFactor,
                           long duration,
                           AnimationListener listener)
        Animates the FAB as if the FAB is morphing into a sheet.
        Parameters:
        endX - The X coordinate that the FAB will be moved to.
        endY - The Y coordinate that the FAB will be moved to.
        side - The side of the arc animation.
        arcDegrees - Amount of arc in FAB movement animation.
        scaleFactor - Amount to scale FAB.
        duration - Duration of the animation in milliseconds. Use 0 for no animation.
        listener - Listener for animation events.

      • morphFromSheet

        public void morphFromSheet(int endX,
                           int endY,
                           Side side,
                           int arcDegrees,
                           float scaleFactor,
                           long duration,
                           AnimationListener listener)
        Animates the FAB as if a sheet is being morphed into a FAB.
        Parameters:
        endX - The X coordinate that the FAB will be moved to.
        endY - The Y coordinate that the FAB will be moved to.
        side - The side of the arc animation.
        arcDegrees - Amount of arc in FAB movement animation.
        scaleFactor - Amount to scale FAB.
        duration - Duration of the animation in milliseconds. Use 0 for no animation.
        listener - Listener for animation events.
